title: No. 45 Chair
body: Classic style of the renowned mid-century furniture designer Finn Juhl, originally designed in spring 1949 in a day however Finn Juhl always had concepts of the design in his thoughts. A powerful, curvaceous design, which dominates in size and extravagance. A master piece from Finn Juhl, the No. 45 chair is widely recognised as the most important movements of Danish modern furniture movement in the 1950's inspred by organic shapes and modern art of the day.
